## 题目`r n_task()`：虚拟变量编码

根据案例情形，数据集中存在三个定性变量$(edu_i,dpt_i,sex_i)$，我们需要依次将它们转换为各自的虚拟变量体系：

```{r}
df_dummy <- df_base %>%
  fastDummies::dummy_cols(select_columns = c("edu","dpt","sex"))

mod_poly <- formula(wage~age+I(age^2))

mod_add_only <- formula(wage~edu_pri+edu_mid+edu_hig+dpt_per+sex_m)


mod_cross_full <- formula(wage~I(dpt_per*sex_m)+I(dpt_per*edu_pri)+I(dpt_per*edu_mid)+I(dpt_per*edu_hig)+I(sex_m*edu_pri)+I(sex_m*edu_mid)+I(sex_m*edu_hig))

mod_cross_sex <- formula(wage~edu_pri+edu_mid+edu_hig+dpt_per+sex_m+I(sex_m*edu_pri)+I(sex_m*edu_mid)+I(sex_m*edu_hig))


mod_hybrid <- formula(wage~age+I(age^2)+edu_pri+edu_mid+edu_hig+dpt_per+sex_m+I(sex_m*edu_pri)+I(sex_m*edu_mid)+I(sex_m*edu_hig))

```


$$
\begin{aligned}
&edu \Longrightarrow  
  \begin{cases}
    edu\_ill  =
    \begin{cases}
    1, & \text{ill}\\
    0, & \text{not ill}
    \end{cases} \\
    edu\_pri = 
    \begin{cases}
    1, & \text{pri}\\
    0, & \text{not pri}
    \end{cases} \\
    edu\_mid  =
    \begin{cases}
    1, & \text{mid}\\
    0, & \text{not mid}
    \end{cases}\\
     edu\_hig  =
    \begin{cases}
    1, & \text{hig}\\
    0, & \text{not hig}
    \end{cases}
  \end{cases}
\end{aligned}
$$

$$
\begin{aligned}
&dpt \Longrightarrow  
  \begin{cases}
    dpt\_tem  =
    \begin{cases}
    1, & \text{tem}\\
    0, & \text{not tem}
    \end{cases} \\
    dpt\_per = 
    \begin{cases}
    1, & \text{per}\\
    0, & \text{not per}
    \end{cases} 
  \end{cases}
\end{aligned}
$$

$$
\begin{aligned}
&sex \Longrightarrow  
  \begin{cases}
    sex\_f  =
    \begin{cases}
    1, & \text{f}\\
    0, & \text{not f}
    \end{cases} \\
    sex\_m = 
    \begin{cases}
    1, & \text{m}\\
    0, & \text{not m}
    \end{cases} 
  \end{cases}
\end{aligned}
$$

## 题目`r n_task()`：定量变量的线性回归模型

如果可以将工资变量（$wage_i$）对年龄变量（$age_i$）进行如下的线性建模（见模型 @eq-poly-model ）：


```{r, results='asis'}
yvars <- "wage"
xvars <- c("age","age^2")
out <- xmerit::qx.psm(
  x =xvars , y = yvars,
  begin = 1,type = "srf",
  #greek.n = length(xvars)+1,
  n.row = 3,
  obs= "i",
  lm.label = "poly-model",
  lm.tag = "polynomial model",
  no_dollar = FALSE)
```

（1）运用Eviews菜单（Quick $\Rightarrow$ Estimate Equation），对上述模型（见式 @eq-poly-model ）进行回归分析。在Eviews软件中，以方程对象（Equation![](../pic/object/Equation.png)）形式保存上述回归结果，并命名为`eq_poly`。最后截图到下列空白处。

<br>

```{r, results='asis', eval=FALSE}

  style = c('srf'),
  obs = "i",
  inf = c('over','fit','Ftest'),
```
